list.name: Default
list.comment: src/arm/beaglebone.c Changed gpio assignment for Pin 73, the documentation I used was incorrect. Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>

task.summary: Default task
Added platform definitions for new devices

Initial version of Banana Pi Support.
Banana Pro definitions are also there but not verified on hardware

Initial version of Beaglebone Black Support.
Based on official Debian Image 3.8.x Kernel.) All working so far except for pwm which is still messy (mostly because available documentation is usually for older kernels and improvements from newer unofficial builds are not yet available in the official build

Updated version of Raspberry Pi Support.
Added Models A/B/A+/B+ and extended the definitions for the "+" devices Removed the old Raspberry Pi specific files
Some cosmetic changes and added the new devices
Added new function to be able to use pwm on Beaglebone Black

Initial version of Beaglebone Black Support.
Based on official Debian Image 3.8.x Kernel.) All working so far except for pwm which is still messy (mostly because available documentation is usually for older kernels and improvements from newer unofficial builds are not yet available in the official build
Added Definitions for new boards and changed Raspberry Pi definition
Added Source Files to the cmake build

examples/gpio.c Added whitespace to better align gpio list output
Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>

examples/gpio.c Added support for mmap access to gpio
Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
examples/spi.c Initialization of spi is necessary on Beaglebone Black Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
examples/spi.c Add 16bit wide convenience functions for spi Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
examples/spi_max7219.c Example for 16bit wide convenience functions Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
examples/i2c_ht16k33.c Example for the ht16k33 LED driver chip Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
src/mraa.c added helper functions to support globbing and link analysis include/mraa_internal.h exported helper functions as internal functions Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>

api/mraa/types.h renamed enum for raspberry to make it more global
Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
include/arm/raspberry_pi.h Added pincount defines for all supported devices Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>

src/arm/ added support for all models of Raspbery Pi A/B/A+/B+ and Raspberry Pi 2 B
Features SPI,I2C,GPIO and mmap access to GPIO
Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
src/arm/raspberry_pi.c added log.info when loading modules for spi, moved check for device existance into the load block Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>

api/mraa/spi.h replaced uint16 in new functions with word api/mraa/spi.hpp replaced uint16 in new functions with word examples/spi_max7219.c changed code to match renamed functions src/spi/spi.c replaced uint16 in new functions with word Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
api/mraa/spi.hpp replaced tab's on start of line with spaces Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
api/mraa/src/arm/raspberry_pi.c fixed cut & waste error, wrong pin number used for Raspberry Pi in default case Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
api/mraa/src/arm/raspberry_pi.c fixed cut & waste error, wrong pin number used for Raspberry Pi in default case Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>

include/mraa_adv_func.h Added possibility to override pwm initialization, current code in pwm does not work for beaglebone src/pwm/pwm.c Implemented check for pwm_init_replace Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
api/mraa/types.h added enum for Beaglebone devices Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
include/arm/beaglebone.h added header with definitions for the Beaglebone Black Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
src/arm/beaglebone.c Fixed bug in detection of Beaglebone Black Rev C Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
src/arm/beaglebone.c Better Error Messages when loading of Cape fails Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
src/arm/beaglebone.c Changed gpio assignment for Pin 73, the documentation I used was incorrect. Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>

MESSAGE.value:
Initial version of Beaglebone Black Support.
Based on official Debian Image 3.8.x Kernel.) All working so far except for pwm which is still messy (mostly because available documentation is usually for older kernels and improvements from newer unofficial builds are not yet available in the official build
Added Definitions for new boards and changed Raspberry Pi definition
Added Source Files to the cmake build
Added whitespace to better align gpio list output

Added whitespace to better align gpio list output
Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>

examples/gpio.c Added whitespace to better align gpio list output
Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>

examples/gpio.c Added support for mmap access to gpio
Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
examples/spi.c Initialization of spi is necessary on Beaglebone Black Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>

examples/spi_max7219.c Example for 16bit wide convenience functions Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
examples/i2c_ht16k33.c Example for the ht16k33 LED driver chip Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
src/mraa.c added helper functions to support globbing and link analysis include/mraa_internal.h exported helper functions as internal functions Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>

api/mraa/types.h renamed enum for raspberry to make it more global
Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
include/arm/raspberry_pi.h Added pincount defines for all supported devices Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>

src/arm/ added support for all models of Raspbery Pi A/B/A+/B+ and Raspberry Pi 2 B
Features SPI,I2C,GPIO and mmap access to GPIO
Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
src/arm/raspberry_pi.c added log.info when loading modules for spi, moved check for device existance into the load block Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>

api/mraa/spi.h replaced uint16 in new functions with word api/mraa/spi.hpp replaced uint16 in new functions with word examples/spi_max7219.c changed code to match renamed functions src/spi/spi.c replaced uint16 in new functions with word Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
api/mraa/spi.hpp replaced tab's on start of line with spaces Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>

api/mraa/types.h added enum for Beaglebone devices Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
include/arm/beaglebone.h added header with definitions for the Beaglebone Black Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>

src/arm/beaglebone.c Better Error Messages when loading of Cape fails Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
src/arm/beaglebone.c Changed gpio assignment for Pin 73, the documentation I used was incorrect. Signed-off-by: Michael Ring <mail@michael-ring.org>
